titles.title: Department of Agriculture Inspection and Quarantine Services Payment Act
To provide consistent treatment of overtime, night, and holiday inspection and quarantine services performed by employees of the Department of Agriculture.

bill.summary: 11/30/2001--Introduced. Department of Agriculture Inspection and Quarantine Services Payment Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to: (1) pay for overtime, night, and holiday work performed under Department of Agriculture inspection or quarantine laws; and (2) require reimbursement for such services from the parties for whom such services are performed.
